titleStmt.title: The honest and plaine dealing fa[r]rier or, A present remedy for curing diseases and hurts in horses Gathered and written as well for the good [o]f any that will practise it, as for my self, there being nothing contained therein but what is of my owne experience and practise. By Thomas Grymes.
titleStmt.author: Grymes, Thomas.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Wil: Iones for Andrew Kembe, dwelling by St: Margarets hill in long Southwarke,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: A very good remedy for diseases in horses.
The first "r" is "farrier" has dropped out on title page; leaves very tightly bound.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
